description: The One who has plenty of mercy for the believers and the blasphemers in this world and especially for the believers in the hereafter.
The One who has plenty of mercy for the believers in the hereafter.
The One with the complete dominion, the One whose dominion is clear from imperfection.
The One who is pure from any imperfection and clear from children and adversaries.
The One who is free from every imperfection and whose name brings peace and tranquility.
The One who witnessed for Himself that no one is God but Him and witnessed for His believers that they are truthful in their belief.
The One who witnesses the saying and deeds of His creatures.
The Strong, The Defeater who is not defeated.
The One that nothing happens in His dominion except what He wills.
The One who is clear from the attributes of the creatures and from resembling them.
The One who brings everything from non-existence to existence.
The Maker who created all of the creation and made them different from each other.
The One who forms His creatures in different shapes and forms.
The One who forgives the sins of His servants time and time again.
The Dominant One who has the perfect Power and is never conquered.
The One who is Generous in giving plenty without any return and without any effort.
The One who provides everything that benefits His creatures.
The One who opens for His slaves the closed worldly and religious matters.
The One who knows all the details of all things, hidden or visible, small or large.
The One who constricts the sustenance by His wisdom and expands and widens it with His generosity and mercy.
The One who expands and widens sustenance for whomever He wills.
The One who lowers whoever He wills by His destruction and raises whoever He wills by His endowment.
The One who raises whoever He wills in status and honor.
The One who gives strength and honor to whoever He wills.
The One who dishonors and humiliates whoever He wills.
The One who hears all voices regardless of the different languages without any effort.
The One who sees all things that are seen without any instrument or organ.
The One who judges and there is no judgment other than His judgment.
The One who is Just in His judgment and there is no oppression in His justice.
The One who is kind to His slaves and endows upon them what is beneficial.
The One who knows the truth of all things.
The One who delays the punishment for those who deserve it and then He might forgive them.
The One deserving of great attributes and perfect in majesty.
The One who forgives a lot and covers sins.
The One who gives a lot of reward for a little obedience.
The One who is clear from the attributes of the creatures.
The One who is greater than everything in status.
The One who protects whatever and whoever He wills to protect.
The One who has the Power to make things happen and provides sustenance.
The One who gives the satisfaction and is sufficient for those who rely on Him.
The One who is attributed with greatness of Power and Glory of status.
The One who is attributed with greatness and honor, whose generosity is plenty.
The One who watches over all creation and maintains everything.
The One who answers the one in need if he asks Him and rescues the yearner if he calls upon Him.
The One who is all-embracing and His knowledge encompasses everything.
The One who is correct in His doings and places all things in their proper places.
The One who loves His believing slaves and His believing slaves love Him.
The One who is with perfect Power, High Status, Compassion, Generosity and Kindness.
The One who resurrects His slaves after death for reward and/or punishment.
The One who nothing is absent from Him and witnesses everything.
The One who truly exists and whose existence is confirmed.
The One who gives all things to those who depend on Him and He is sufficient for whoever relies on Him.
The One with the complete Power and does not get tired.
The One with extreme Power which is un-interrupted and He does not get tired.
The One who supports and protects whoever obeys Him.
The One who is praised and praiseworthy for His beautiful attributes and actions.
The One who the count of things is known to Him.
The One who started the creation from non-existence.
The One who brings back the creatures after death.
The One who gives life and took out a living human from semen that does not have a soul.
The One who renders the living dead and makes the heart die by depriving it of guidance.
The One who is attributed with a life that is unlike our life and is not that of a combination of soul, flesh or blood.
The One who remains and does not end and is the maintainer of everything.
The Rich who is never poor and nothing is lacking from Him.
The One who is Majid and everything He does is with extreme generosity.
The One who is unique in His essence, attributes, and actions.
The One without a partner who is indivisible.
The Master who is relied upon in matters and reverted to in needs.
The One attributed with Power and is never unable.
The One with the perfect Power that nothing is withheld from Him.
The One who puts things in their right place and gives preference to whatever He wills.
The One who delays things to their proper times.
The One whose existence is without a beginning.
The One whose existence is without an end.
The One that nothing is above Him and nothing is underneath Him, hence He exists without a place.
The One who knows all the hidden secrets and is closer to everything than anything else.
The One who owns things and manages them.
The One who is clear from the attributes of the creation.
The One who is kind to His creatures, who covered them with His sustenance and specified whomever He willed with His support, protection, and special mercy.
The One who grants repentance to whomever He wills among His creatures and accepts their repentance.
The One who victoriously prevails over His enemies and punishes them for their sins.
The One with wide forgiveness who erases sins and pardons wrongdoers.
The One with extreme Mercy and kindness for His creation.
The One who controls the dominion and gives dominion to whoever He wills.

meaning: The Lord of Majesty and Bounty
description: The One who deserves to be Exalted and not denied, the One who is attributed with greatness and generosity.
The One who is Just in His judgment and establishes justice.
The One who gathers the creatures on a day that there is no doubt about, the Day of Judgment.
The One who does not need the creation and all the creation needs Him.
The One who satisfies the necessities of His creation and makes them rich.
The One who protects and prevents harm from whomever He wills.
The One who makes harm reach to whoever He wills according to His wisdom.
The One from whom benefit reaches to whoever He wills according to His wisdom.
The One who guides His creation with His light and illuminates the hearts of believers.
The One who guides to the path of righteousness and shows the way.
The One who created the creation and formed it without any preceding example.
The One that the state of non-existence is impossible for Him.
The One whose existence remains after all creation has perished.
The One who guides to the right path and teaches righteousness.
The One who does not quickly punish the sinners and gives them time to repent.
